index.description: Decide how much you want to invest in total and distribute the amount on different opportunities.
index.title: How much would you like to invest?

tooltip.expectedReturn: The amount of profit or loss you can anticipate receiving on an investment.

emptyState.title: No opportunities yet in your portfolio

investmentWork.description: <0>Your capital will be deployed to opportunities over the <1>next {{year}} years*</1> in accordance with your investment strategy, and will be invested immediately to maximize return.</0>
investmentWork.disclaimer: *The deployment pace is subject to opportunity availability. Uninvested commitments will be invested in pre‐funding vehicles managed by Petiole Asset Management AG and subsequently used for capital calls.
investmentWork.heading: Your investment overview
investmentWork.title: Funding your investments

projectedCashflow.disclaimer: *Capital calls are transferred directly from your funds.
projectedCashflow.heading: Projected cash flow

capitalGrowth.description: <0>It will consist of a carefully selected group of diversified asset classes such as</0> <1>private equity</1> <2>and</2> <3>real estate</3> <4>ensuring long-term capital appreciation, reduced volatility, and regular income.</4>

capitalYielding.description: <0>It will include a carefully selected group of diversified asset classes such as</0> <1>real estate</1> <2>and</2> <3>private credit</3> <4>ensuring long-term capital appreciation and reduced volatility.</4>

opportunities.description: <0>It will focus on</0> <1>dislocation themes</1> <2>aiming to generate superior risk-adjusted returns.</2>

default.description: <0>It will consist of the</0> <1>investments</1> <2>chosen by the investor.</2>

opportunistic.description: <0>It will focus on</0> <1>dislocation themes</1> <2>aiming to generate superior risk-adjusted returns.</2>

expectedReturn.description: The expected annualized return taking into consideration the expected: (i) income/ yield and (ii) capital appreciation. It is the expected return once the commitments are fully deployed.
expectedReturn.label: Expected Return

expectedVol.description: By linking your commitments to public market benchmarks, we present the expected volatility for a public-equivalent portfolio. The actual behavior of alternative investments can vary greatly from public markets as shown by the performance during downturns.
expectedVol.label: Forecasted Volatility

expectedYield.description: The annual target income generated by the portfolio as a percentage of the original investment amount once the signed commitments are fully deployed.
expectedYield.label: Target Income

sharpeRatio.description: Represents your portfolio's risk adjusted return by calculating the return for the excess risk divided by the forecasted volatility of the portfolio.
sharpeRatio.label: Sharpe Ratio

info.text1KSA: This proposal is provided to you by The Family Office International Investment Co. (“The Family Office”) for informational purposes only, and contains proprietary information that may not be reproduced, distributed to, or used by, any third parties without The Family Office’s prior written consent.
info.commonText: The Family Office makes no representation or warranty, express or implied, with respect to any financial projection or forecast. With respect to any such projection or forecast delivered or made available by or on behalf of The Family office, it is acknowledged that (a) there are uncertainties inherent in attempting to make such projections and forecasts, (b) the investor is familiar with such uncertainties, (c) the investor takes full responsibility for making its own evaluation of the adequacy and accuracy of all such projections and forecasts so furnished to it and (d) the investor has no claim against The Family Office.
info.text1NonKSA: This proposal is provided to you by The Family Office Co. BSC(c) (“The Family Office”) for informational purposes only, and contains proprietary information that may not be reproduced, distributed to, or used by, any third parties without The Family Office’s prior written consent.

disclaimer.pastPerformance: Past performance is not indicative of and does not guarantee future performance. Exit timelines, prices and related projections are estimates only, and exits could happen sooner or later than expected, or at a higher or lower valuation than expected, and are conditional, among other things, on certain assumptions and future performance relating to the financial and operational health of each business and macroeconomic conditions.

confrimProposalModal.description:
Click “continue” to start your client onboarding process.
Before that, we recommend that you compare your portfolio to our customized investments solutions to validate the best opportunities for you.
confrimProposalModal.title: You’re Now Ready to Invest with The Family Office
